= Introduction =

Mesh4x FeedSync server that supports RESTfull API to synchonize data with uploaded feed through the basic HTTP GET and POST method.

Current implementation in java can be download from Mesh4xDownloads section.

Test server is hosted on http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x


= Details =

== Get protocol ==
 * feed rss20 with all mesh groups in the server
 
http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds

 * feed rss20 with all dataset in mesh group Epiinfo

http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds/Epiinfo

 * rdfxml of Oswego dataset schema(Oswego table structure expressed as RDF)

http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds/Epiinfo/Oswego/schema

 * XForm of Oswego dataset generated from Oswego rdf schema

http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds/Epiinfo/Oswego/schema?content=xform

 * Xml mappings of Oswego dataset
 
http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds/Epiinfo/Oswego/mappings

 * feed rss20, each item is a patient with payload as rdf
 
http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds/Epiinfo/Oswego	

 * feed rss20, each item is a patient with payload as rdf
 
http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds/Epiinfo/Oswego?format=rss20

 * feed atom10, each item is a patient with payload as rdf
 
http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds/Epiinfo/Oswego?format=atom10	

 * kml, each placemark is a patient, use rdf and mappings for translate placemark title and geo lat/lon data
 
http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds/Epiinfo/Oswego?format=kml	
	
 * feed rss20, each item is a patient with payload as xform instance (translated from rdf schema)
 
http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds/Epiinfo/Oswego?content=xform	

 * feed rss20, each item is a patient with payload as xform instance (translated from rdf schema) without feedSync information
 
http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds/Epiinfo/Oswego?content=plain_xform	

 * feed rss20, each item is a patient with payload as plain xml instance (translated from rdf schema) without feedSync information
 
http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds/Epiinfo/Oswego?content=plain_xml	

 * feed rss20, each item is a patient that Country attribute is equals to 'Argentine', payload as rdf instance
 
http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds/Epiinfo/Oswego?filter=Country=Argentine
	
 * feed rss20, each item is a history change of patient information for the item with syncId equals to '1234'
 
http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds/Epiinfo/Oswego/history?syncId=1234	


== Combinations are supported ==
 * feed atom10, each item is a patient that Country attribute is equals to 'Argentine' and is ill, payload as xform instance (translated from rdf schema)
 
http://sync.staging.instedd.org:8080/mesh4x/feeds/Epiinfo/Oswego?format=atom10&content=xform&filter=Country=Argentine and Ill=true
